content:
I am interested in learning more about a specific Instagram user. Can you provide me with the detailed profile information and the name for the user with the Instagram name 'leomesssi'?
Begin!

First step, I need to use the Instagram username 'leomesssi' to query detailed profile information, which may result in both user details and the associated name. I'm going to achieve this by using the "get_profile_info_for_instagram_profile" function.

Let's proceed to do the first call.

name: get_profile_info_for_instagram_profile
content: {"error": "Message error...", "response": "{'error': True, 'username': 'leomesssi', 'errCode': 'ERF', 'status': 400, 'message': 'Not Found, please check username', 'not_found': True}"}

It seems that there was an error indicating that the Instagram username 'leomesssi' does not exist or was misspelled. Given this response, I may have been provided with an incorrect username or the account might not be public or no longer exists.

Since there is no accessible data for this username I will reattempt using spelling oriented alternatives if exist, or directly provide the finish call to indicate the outcome based on this input.

Let's first attempt using a closely accurate username termed 'leomessi' in case 'leomesssi' was a typo before making a final decision.

name: get_profile_info_for_instagram_profile
content: {"error": "", "response": "{'id': '427553890', 'fbid': '17841401016706680', 'username': 'leomessi', 'full_name': 'Leo Messi', 'bio': 'Bienvenidos a la cuenta oficial de Instagram de Leo Messi / Welcome to the official Leo Messi Instagram account', 'followers': 504980580, 'following': 327, 'category_name': 'Athlete', 'is_private': False, 'is_verified': True, 'is_business': True, 'profile_pic_url': 'https://scontent-ord5-3.cdninstagram.com/v/t51.2885-19/424905549_7243065989106669_45026390061580919_n.jpg?stp=dst-jpg_s150x150_tt6&_nc_ht=scontent-ord5-3.cdninstagram.com&_nc_cat=1&_nc_ohc=Gr-DqXzJmAkQ7kNvgHr68_i&_nc_gid=100a87de3ffa426ab5a1119dfa45f4ea&edm=AOQ1c0wBAAAA&ccb=7-5&oh=00_AYBExhgJmdcDAtx5uAjJ7rDfJ7qWZwTXV4PcjRN4P7jIPg&oe=6787CE71&_nc_sid=8b3546', 'profile_pic_url_proxy': 'https://prx.naratetama.com/v1/?t=MzQ3MzE1NTQ4MDE2Ng==&q=https://scontent-ord5-3.cdninstagram.com/v/t51.2885-19/424905549_7243065989106669_45026390061580919_n.jpg?stp=dst-jpg_s150x150_tt6&_nc_ht=scontent-ord5-3.cdninstagram.com&_nc_cat=1...

The retrieval attempt with the username 'leomessi' was successful, indicating it was an input error in the first attempt with 'leomesssi'. 

The detailed information for the account under the username 'leomessi' has been obtained successfully, which includes id, the Facebook username, sizable follower count, following numbers, full name, and a biography stating "Welcome to the official Leo Messi Instagram account." Additionally he is marked as not private, verified, an athlete, a monetary influence in the business grading and publicly shares his photo._

Now, I will provide this as the complete answer to the original query since we've obtained detailed profile information and confirmed the correct name for the Instagram profile. Let's proceed to call "Finish".
